statistical_twins.definition: Researchers with significant overlap in one or more of the following criteria compared to the target scientist:
criteria: ≥70% overlap in citation networks or co-authorship patterns
Similar research themes and methodological approaches
Comparable career trajectory, publication patterns, and academic impact metrics
Shared institutional affiliations or collaborative networks

early_career.definition: Early-Career Scientists: Researchers meeting one or more of the following criteria:
criteria: Currently in postdoctoral positions, assistant professor roles, or equivalent early-stage academic positions
Fewer than 50 total publications in peer-reviewed journals

senior.definition: Senior Scientists: Researchers meeting one or more of the following criteria:
criteria: Currently in full professor, emeritus, or equivalent senior academic positions
Established research leaders with significant impact in their field (high citation counts, major awards, or recognition)
